Uses of Package
org.drip.validation.hypothesis

Packages that use org.drip.validation.hypothesis
Package Description
org.drip.validation.distance
Hypothesis Target Distance Test Builders
org.drip.validation.evidence
Sample and Ensemble Evidence Processing
org.drip.validation.hypothesis
Statistical Hypothesis Validation Test Suite
org.drip.validation.riskfactorsingle
Single Risk Factor Aggregate Tests
  • Classes in org.drip.validation.hypothesis used by org.drip.validation.distance
    Class Description
    R1ProbabilityIntegralTransform
    R1ProbabilityIntegralTransform holds the PIT Distribution CDF of the R1 Test-Statistic Response over the Outcome Instances.
  • Classes in org.drip.validation.hypothesis used by org.drip.validation.evidence
    Class Description
    R1PITTester
    R1PITTester implements Comparison Tests post a R1 PIT Transform on the Hypothesis and/or Test Sample.
    R1ProbabilityIntegralTransform
    R1ProbabilityIntegralTransform holds the PIT Distribution CDF of the R1 Test-Statistic Response over the Outcome Instances.
    R1StatisticalTestOutcome
    R1StatisticalTestOutcome contains the Results of the Significant Test and R1 t-Test of the given Statistical Hypothesis.
    R1TTestOutcome
    R1TTestOutcome holds the Results of a Statistic Hypothesis t-Test on an R1 Ensemble.
    SignificanceTestSetting
    SignificanceTestSetting contains the Control Settings that determine the Success/Failure of the specified Statistical Hypothesis p-Test.
  • Classes in org.drip.validation.hypothesis used by org.drip.validation.hypothesis
    Class Description
    HistogramTestOutcome
    HistogramTestOutcome contains the p-value Cumulative and Incremental Histograms across the Test Statistic.
    HistogramTestSetting
    HistogramTestSetting holds the Settings required to conduct a Histogram Test.
    R1ProbabilityIntegralTransform
    R1ProbabilityIntegralTransform holds the PIT Distribution CDF of the R1 Test-Statistic Response over the Outcome Instances.
    R1TTestOutcome
    R1TTestOutcome holds the Results of a Statistic Hypothesis t-Test on an R1 Ensemble.
    SignificanceTestOutcome
    SignificanceTestOutcome contains the Results of the Significant Test of the Statistical Hypothesis.
    SignificanceTestSetting
    SignificanceTestSetting contains the Control Settings that determine the Success/Failure of the specified Statistical Hypothesis p-Test.
  • Classes in org.drip.validation.hypothesis used by org.drip.validation.riskfactorsingle
    Class Description
    R1ProbabilityIntegralTransform
    R1ProbabilityIntegralTransform holds the PIT Distribution CDF of the R1 Test-Statistic Response over the Outcome Instances.
